Everyone has a type whether it’s tall, dark and handsome or petite and blonde. 
And now a new dating show – named Game of Clones – is aiming to find singletons not one but EIGHT of their exact type to choose from. 
The E4 show will let those looking for love to design their perfect partner virtually – from hair colour to body shape to dress sense. 
They will then be presented with eight clones who look – and are dressed – exactly to their specifications. On Game of Clones singletons are presented with their exact type (Photo: Channel 4) They must choose from eight clones (Photo: Channel 4) 
Every day the clones will take part in group dates to help the singleton work out whose personality they like the best. 
The unusual dates will include a Bollywood performance, wine tasting and even designing tattoos. 
If the dates go well, the clones can earn some one-on-one time with the singleton in the Love Mobile – the car that takes them back to the house. They go on dates every night for a week (Photo: Channel 4) Singletons virtually create their exact type (Photo: Channel 4) 
But a dating disaster would see them send to the Dumping Room where they have to plead for their place. 
Each night a clone is dumped and after a week the singleton will be left with their final three and must decide who is their “one and clonely” to join them for a final date. 
The first episode will see 23-year-old Charlotte design the man of her dreams. 
* Game of Clones starts at 7:30pm from Monday 27 February on E4 Like us on Facebook
